intro: [WRONG START] Walenia laurifolia var. laurifolia, commonly known as the glossy laurel. It is a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree characterized by its dense, dark green, leathery leaves that are glossy on both sides. The plant produces small, white, fragrant flowers that are clustered in umbels, followed by red, fleshy fruits. It thrives in warm, humid climates and is often used in ornamental landscaping due to its attractive appearance and hardy nature. The leaves are also used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits.
